content.rendered: Sangram Patil, Nilesh Pasalkar, and Savan Oswal, three joined hands to create one of India’s path-breaking coffee brand, “KIOSK KAFFEE”. Founded in Dec 2020, just after the world was ravaged by the first wave of Covid.
